name: Retro RPG (Cursed Haze)
description:
Currently im working on a retro RPG game and would love some feedback on the following aspects:

  • Visual / Style
  • Movement
  • Combat

📰UPDATE: (Version 0.00.04)

  • Added an equipment cycle system
  • Added bow and arrow
  • Added bombs

📰UPDATE: (Version 0.00.03)

  • Added 8 type of weapons with different sprites, length and damage.
  • Added an animated death screen.

📰UPDATE: (Version 0.00.02)

  • Added a new Bat enemy.
  • Added pushable boxes, pressure plates and fences.
  • Added chests.
